name: Bleach:Blood War
description:
Kurosaki Ichigo is a high school student who can see ghosts. One day, he encountered Kuchiki Rukia, someone who claimed to be a Shinigami, and embarked on a wonderful journey!!!

Relive the Chapter of Substitute Shinigami! Perfect reproduction of every classic scene in the original anime in this amazing game boasting unique and refreshing character cultivation and battles!


--Assembly of Gotei 13--
More than 100 characters for you to choose from! Obtain your favorite characters via multiple means to build the strongest division and enjoy the most realistic battle experience!


--Experience Exciting Battles--
Super-powerful ultimate skills and released soulslayers!! Magnificent effects of unique skills, giving you incredible battle experiences!


--Fight Together to Protect Soul Society--
The game features an outstanding social function, allowing you to make friends from all over the world and fight alongside them!

[Tips]
